== Ambalavayal (627322) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Ambalavayal is a village in the [[Sulthanbathery]] taluka of [[Wayanad]] district with an area of 2823 hectares and harbouring 4117 households with total population of 16988 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kalpetta]] is at a distance of 25 km. Male population is 8290 and female population is 8698. Scheduled Caste Population is 569 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3378. Census Location Code of the village is 627322<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 13501 (79.47%)
* Literate male population: 6794 (81.95%)
* Literate female population: 6707 (77.11%)
